package.name: clegs_sim_control
package.description: This gets the information from the patterns commands and translate into the commands necessaries to move the simulation. There is one package equal in the hardware branch but for the real robot. With this package, the developer only has to be focus on generate a correct gait pattern, then the software do all the necessaries modifications to translate it into the simulation model.
package.author: Raul Cebolla Arroyo
Jorge De Leon
